question1.title: How do I make an appointment?
question1.answer: You can make an appointment by clicking on the Doctors image in the Doctor section.

question2.title: Do I need to create an account to book an appointment?
question2.answer: Yes, to streamline the booking process and provide better services, we recommend creating an account.
